nodes.text: Jedi romances were a genre of literature which existed during the High Republic Era. Works in the genre were typically set at outposts on the Republic frontiers, and contained unrequited love communicated via longing glances. They usually featured lightsaber battles which were intended as a substitute for what the characters really desired. Scantech (second class) Vel Carann was obsessed with the romances and read them constantly on her datapad when she was supposed to be working at the Hetzal system monitoring station. Her colleague Merven Getter did not understand her fascination, having read some of the romances and been left unimpressed.
